definition: perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: Containing fingerprint neutralising agent, which prevent corrosion from finger etching.
sentences.chinese: 含指紋中和劑，能防止因指紋印汗液所做成的腐蝕。

sentences.english: Answer: True. As you exercise, tiny tears form in your muscle tissue.
sentences.chinese: 當你運動時，細小的汗液在你的肌肉組織中形成。

sentences.english: To excrete perspiration through the pores of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 通過皮膚上的毛孔排泄汗液。

sentences.english: Is the sweat of envy's foot.
Perspiration is the perfect combination of mosquito attractants – moisture and odors.
sentences.chinese: 汗液是蚊子吸引劑潮溼和氣味的完美結合。

sentences.english: The most common type, known as prickly heat, results when sweat escapes into the epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的一型，即痱子，因汗液溢入表皮內而導致。

sentences.english: Do you have tricks for keeping the sweat and sunscreen out of your eyes?
sentences.chinese: 你有什麼可以防止汗液和防曬霜進入眼睛的技巧麼？

sentences.english: Because the cotton moisture absorption strong, and is well positioned to absorb the sweat on the skin.
sentences.chinese: 因爲棉料吸溼性強，可以很好地吸收皮膚上的汗液。

sentences.english: Clothing that is impermeable to water prevents the evaporation of sweat from the skin.
sentences.chinese: 穿着不透水的衣服會阻礙體表汗液的蒸發。

sentences.english: The human body eliminates toxicants through sweat, and urine.
sentences.chinese: 人體通過汗液和尿液排毒。

sentences.english: The sweat effects were studied by the way of affecting sweat secretion of the rats' paw.
sentences.chinese: 通過對大鼠足跖汗液分泌的影響觀察其發汗解表作用。

sentences.english: But measuring sweat output is not easy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，衡量汗液排出量並不容易。

definition: to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
